body:
Go 1.7 and 1.6 diverged too much that if we want a fix for 1.6, we pretty
much have to develop a separate fix for 1.6 that doesn't work on Go 1.7,
and vice versa.

AIUI, the problem is that we don't have a fix in time for 1.7 so Lynn
proposed to apply a fix to 1.6 branch directly.

Is there any stopgap solution for 1.7 that is very simple? As once 1.7 is
out of the door, we won't release new minor releases for 1.6, perhaps it's
better to push a simple fix into 1.7 instead.
